modName: Poisons Merchant also sells poison apples
summary: Adds a merchant named Keeva in Arcadia\'s Cauldron in Whiterun who sells poisons and poison apples
descriptionHtml:
About Mod
----------------
Well anyways this mod adds a merchant named Keeva in Arcadia\'s Cauldron in Whiterun who sells poisons and poison apples (if you guys think I should add a wider variety of poisons let me know)
Also I tried lowering the value of the poisons then their default be for some reason ingame they\'re higher then what I set them at, I\'ll fix that later. Also if you guys think the poison apples aren\'t potent enough let me know and I\'ll increase how much dps it does. (Also not sure if npcs will pick up the apples if you leave them around haven\'t tested it yet, if you guys test it out for me I\'d really appreciate it)

Installation
---------------
Just drop the esp file into your data folder then check off Merchant Keeva in your data files when you start the game

Uninstallation
--------------------
Uncheck Merchant Keeva in your data files then delete the esp from your data folder

Bugs
-------
None yet, let me know if there are any

Permissions
----------------
Feel free to edit and reupload how ever you want, credit is not necessary but it would be appreciated if you do give it :D
author: lionheart902
